long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the fight to overcome age-related diseases such as Alzheimer’s, cancer, and heart disease with every browser tab you open!

Tabs for Life transforms your "new tab" page to greet you with a page filled with the latest scientific news on biotechnology aimed at overcoming age-related disease, and extending healthy human lifespan. In addition to helping you stay informed on this exciting field, revenue from banner ads on this page will support the 501c3 charity organization LEAF, which raises funds and awareness for research aimed at extending human lifespan. 

Every second someone dies of age-related disease; that is over 100,000 people every single day. You can be part of a growing grassroots movement to fight this and promote the health of every person in the entire world - just by opening a tab!

Learn more at https://www.lifespan.io
